CXR470.Texto: The cardiac and mediastinal contours are within normal limits. The lungs are well-inflated and clear. There is no focal consolidation, pneumothorax, or effusion. The bony structures of the thorax are unremarkable.

Utterance.PhraseText: The cardiac and mediastinal contours are within normal limits.
The lungs are well-inflated and clear.
There is no focal consolidation, pneumothorax, or effusion.
